metadata.Title: CVE-2009-1182 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
Multiple buffer overflows in the JBIG2 MMR decoder in Xpdf 3.02pl2 andearlier, CUPS 1.3.9 and earlier, Poppler before 0.10.6, and other productsallow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted PDF file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2009-1182` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-poppler-0.18 - 0.10.5-1ubuntu2
libpoppler-cpp0v5 - 0.10.5-1ubuntu2
libpoppler-glib8 - 0.10.5-1ubuntu2
libpoppler-qt5-1 - 0.10.5-1ubuntu2
libpoppler111 - 0.10.5-1ubuntu2
poppler-utils - 0.10.5-1ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: poppler package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.10.5-1ubuntu2').
